item.description: Once again, I will be hosting games at my place for the day on May 19th, 2012 (Saturday) for those that wish to come up and try new games (or old games if you wish). I will provide drinks and snacks. You are welcomed to bring a food item or if you wish, order out for lunch collectively! Come by, play games, leave, come back, play more games, whatever you wish - just show up ready to play!
item.name: Games In LA-conia
